title: Time up for Old-School Altitude Camps? High-End Hypoxia Hotels Hope to Rival Time on Teide, Tignes
content:
Game changers? New Belgian resort joins Denia's Syncrosfera as an altitude training alternative for the WorldTour elite.

Read the full article at Time up for Old-School Altitude Camps? High-End Hypoxia Hotels Hope to Rival Time on Teide, Tignes on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
